GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object containing the specified user

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object matching the specified id

article.author: j_doe
article.title: Life and times of John Doe
article.body: He came, he saw, he conquered.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments relating to an article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increases or decreases the number of votes for an article by an amount specified in the request body, and serves the updated article

article.author: j_doe
article.title: Life and times of John Doe
article.body: He came, he saw, he conquered.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment and serves that comment back to the user

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment from the database, with nothing to serve back to the user
